netsquid\.components\.qprocessor
--------------------------------

.. automodule:: netsquid.components.qprocessor
    :members:
    :show-inheritance:
    :inherited-members:

.. attribute:: netsquid.components.qprocessor.error_on_program_fail

   *bool* - Whether to always raise the exception that causes a quantum processor to fail instead of only record it. Default is False.

.. attribute:: netsquid.components.qprocessor.nv_super_instructions

   *dict* - processor instruction hierarchy (based on NV centres).
